title: "Committed" (last commit time) in dataimport status is updated even when the commit fail
description:
Commit failed because of faulty disk with:
23:53:46 SEVERE SolrWriter Exception while solr commit.
But the "Committed" field on the status (/solr/<core>/dataimport?command=status) page show:
<str name="Committed">2013-09-25 23:53:46</str>
